metadata.Title: CVE-2020-18898 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible.
metadata.Description: A stack exhaustion issue in the printIFDStructure function of Exiv2 0.27 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (DOS) via a crafted file.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> This only affects debug builds and is not in Ubuntu binaries

criterions.comment: exiv2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
